description_txt: stated on June 4, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: A Florida millionaire was arrested after admitting to burying more than 700 bodies on his property.

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2019 in a press release:
quote_txt: The Trump administration has denied "4.2 million American workers overtime."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2019 in a TV appearance:
quote_txt: "When President Obama was elected, the market crashed … Trump was up 9%, President Obama was down 14.8% and President Bush was down almost 4%. There is an instant reaction on Wall Street."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2019 in a speech.:
quote_txt: "Five years ago, when I took office, our state was mired in debt - a $2.4 billion debt left over by Republicans."

description_txt: stated on June 20, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "30,000 Americans a year die waiting for health care because of the cost."

description_txt: stated on June 23, 2019 in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: California "admitted" there were "a million" illegal votes in the 2016 presidential election.

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: People are attaching HIV-infected needles to gas station pump handles.

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2019 in remarks to reporters on the White House South Lawn.:
quote_txt: Says the Central Park Five "admitted their guilt."

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2019 in an interview with Stephen Colbert:
quote_txt: In 2018, when he ran for senator, "young voter turnout in early voting was up 500%. We won more votes than any Democrat has in the history of the state of Texas."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2019 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says that after "the last income tax increase in the state of Illinois, we saw the largest exodus of middle-income families."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2019 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Even in the last Congress, President Trump signed 18 of my bills."

description_txt: stated on June 20, 2019 in a Telemundo interview:
quote_txt: "When I became president, President Obama had a separation policy. I didn’t have it. He had it."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says Amazon is "paying full-time employees so little that they require gov food assistance."

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Texas remains one of the most severely impacted states from drug trafficking. Nearly 3,000 Texans died from drug related deaths in 2017 – with half being overdoses involving opioids."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says the "only valid reason to oppose voter ID is that you plan to cheat," and "every Democrat in Congress opposes voter ID."

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "The United States is the ONLY industrialized country without universal healthcare."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Clint Eastwood said Hollywood is "the place of traitors and pedophilians" and he’s decided to "leave" it to "fight against traitors with real American patriots with president Trump."

description_txt: stated on June 20, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Quotes Gene Hackman as saying that Trump could "easily turn out to be one of the best presidents that America has ever seen."

description_txt: stated on June 16, 2019 in an ABC News interview:
quote_txt: "Well, I got 52% (of women voters). And I will tell you — in my opinion I might have won women. ... Hey, Hillary Clinton focused on women, and I did phenomenally well."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says Joe Biden hasn’t admitted he was wrong on the Iraq War, as he did with the Hyde Amendment.

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Quotes Queen Elizabeth II as saying that Trump is "an amazing person" with a "good heart" who could have been her son in another life.

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2019 in a speech in Iowa:
quote_txt: "Why should you get a break for racehorses and not get a break for child care?"

description_txt: stated on May 27, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: A bike a boy chained to a tree in Washington state in 1914 is now a fallen soldier memorial.

description_txt: stated on June 12, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Ayn Rand said, "The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me."

description_txt: stated on April 18, 2016 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: A retired U.S. Army sergeant faces life in prison for killing two Syrian refugees after discovering they raped his teenage daughter.

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "FactCheck.org exposed Snopes.com as an extremely liberal propaganda site with an agenda to discredit anything that appears to be conservative."

description_txt: stated on June 12, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Barack Obama said, ‘If we don’t do something about this president, I will’ at DNC fundraiser last night."

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2019 in radio interview.:
quote_txt: Red-flag laws have been "shown to reduce the number of suicides by firearms."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Mark Zuckerberg invented the word "BFF," and if it doesn’t appear green after you type it in a Facebook comment, your account has been hacked.

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says "For the first time in our state’s history, the Pride flag has been raised at our State Capitol!!"
